The causes of Autism, though not definitively known, are believed to be a combination of genetic and environmental factors. It is a complex disorder where the causes are presumed at the genetic level, such as some contraindicated medicines consumed during [pregnancy](https://www.lybrate.com/topic/pregnancy), exposure to environmental chemicals, metabolic imbalance, [vaccination](https://www.lybrate.com/topic/vaccination), and others.
